results.name: Eventual period of a single cell in rule 90 cellular automaton in a cyclic universe of width n.
link: O. Martin, A. M. Odlyzko, S. Wolfram, Algebraic properties of cellular automata, Comm. Math. Physics, 93 (1984), pp. 219-258, Reprinted in Theory and Applications of Cellular Automata, S.
